title: 93/426/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1993 granting the second Community contribution to the autonomous regions of Azores and Madeira provided for in Council Decision 91/315/EEC to compensate for the extra costs of supplying oil to these archipelagos in 1991 (balance) and 1992 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 July 1993 granting the second Community contribution to the autonomous regions of Azores and Madeira provided for in Council Decision 91/315/EEC to compensate for the extra costs of supplying oil to these archipelagos in  1991 (balance) and 1992 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(93/426/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Community contribution is granted subject to the conditions set out in section 10.5 of the Annex to Decision 91/315/EEC.
The deadline for submission by the Portuguese authorities of the report provided for in section 10.5 of the Annex to the abovementioned Decision shall be one year from the date of publication of this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1993.
For the Commission
Abel MATUTES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 171, 29. 6. 1991, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 239, 22. 8. 1992, p. 13.
